T02D3150:173b-1: sha ta ksha ra s'a dha na /
T02D3150:173b-3: yi ge drug pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3150:173b-4: dang por re zhig sngags pas bde ba'i stan la nye bar gnas te /
T02D3150:173b-5: gdong ba'i gtsang sbra la sogs pa byas la /
T02D3150:173b-6: rang nyid kyi snying ga'i zla ba la gnas pa'i
T02D3150:173b-7: yi ge hr'i: dkar po las rnam par 'phros pa'i
T02D3150:173b-8: 'od zer gyis / bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mdun du bltas pas /
T02D3150:173b-9: legs par mchod cing gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams bya ste /
T02D3150:173b-10: dkon mchog gsum la bdag phyag mchi //
T02D3150:173b-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T02D3150:173b-12: ji srid du sems can du bsdu bar bya bas bsdus par gyur pa /
T02D3150:173b-13: sgo nga las skyes pa dang /
T02D3150:173b-15: drod gsher las skyes pa dang /
T02D3150:173b-18: gzugs can ma yin pa dang /
T02D3150:173b-21: 'du shes yod pa yang ma yin 'du shes med pa yang ma yin pa ste /
T02D3150:173b-22: ji srid du gang 'ga' zhig sems can gyi khams
T02D3150:173b-23: su gdags par bya bas btags par gyur pa rnams
T02D3150:173b-24: / thams cad kyang bdag gis phung po lhag ma
T02D3150:173b-25: med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su legs
T02D3150:173b-27: de nas aom rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas
T02D3150:173b-28: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa
T02D3150:173b-29: ni bdag yin no zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod
T02D3150:173b-30: par bya ba'o // de'i rjes su stong pa nyid yud tsam cig dmigs par bya'o //
T02D3150:173b-31: de'i rjes thogs la snying gar padma dkar po'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D3150:174a-2: de la 'od zer 'bum phrag du ma kun nas 'phros par bsgoms la /
T02D3150:174a-3: des sems can rnams kyi yang thog ma med pa'i
T02D3150:174a-4: dus nas bsags pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon
T02D3150:174a-5: mongs pa'i tshogs rnams lhag ma ma lus par rnam
T02D3150:174a-6: par sbyangs te / slar yang de nyid la gzhug par bya'o //
T02D3150:174a-7: de yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid 'jig rten
T02D3150:174a-8: dbang phyug gi gzugs su bsgom par bya ste rgyan
T02D3150:174a-9: thams cad kyis brgyan pa sku mdog dkar po phyag
T02D3150:174a-11: g-yas pa phreng ba 'dzin pa phyag gzhan dag gnyis
T02D3150:174a-12: kyis thugs kar thal mo kha sbyar nas gnas pa'o
T02D3150:174a-13: // phyag dang sku mdog de lta bu dang ldan pa dag gis nor bu 'dzin pa /
T02D3150:174a-14: g-yas phyogs na padma gzhan gyi steng na gnas pa'o //
T02D3150:174a-15: g-yon phyogs na de kho na bzhin du yi ge
T02D3150:174a-16: drug gi rig ma chen mo padma gzhan la gnas
T02D3150:174a-18: aom rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba chen po dza: h'um bam ho: //
T02D3150:174a-19: dpa' bo khyod aa la la la la ho: aa:
T02D3150:174a-20: aa: aa: aa: zhes bya ba ni byin gyis rlob
T02D3150:174a-21: par byed pa'i sngags kyi rgyal po brjod par bya'o
T02D3150:174a-22: // de ltar bsgoms la de nas sangs rgyas thams
T02D3150:174a-23: cad kyi snying por gyur pa yid bzhin gyi nor
T02D3150:174a-24: bur brtags par bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po
T02D3150:174a-25: 'di bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug gi snying ga'i
T02D3150:174a-26: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la kha dog dkar po phreng
T02D3150:174a-27: ba'i rnam par kha nas phyir byung nas lte khung
T02D3150:174a-28: du legs par 'jug pa 'khor lo ltar 'khor ba'i
T02D3150:174a-29: tshul du mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor gyis blta
T02D3150:174a-30: // bar bya'o // de ltar bzlas pa byas nas /
T02D3150:174a-31: g-yo ba dang gzhug pa la sogs pa 'thob ste /
T02D3150:174a-32: dad pa dang snying rje dang ldan zhing bla ma
T02D3150:174a-33: la gus pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni dus ring po
T02D3150:174a-35: aom ma ni pad me h'um /
T02D3150:174a-37: de nas langs pa'i dus na ni sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brjod nas langs par bya ste /
T02D3150:174a-38: aom badzra satva sa ma ya /
T02D3150:174a-40: badzra satva tve no pa tishtha /
T02D3150:174a-41: dri dho me bha ba su toshyo me bha ba /
T02D3150:174a-43: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D3150:174a-44: sarba siddhi mme pra yatstsha sarba karma su tsa me
T02D3150:174a-45: tsittam shri yam ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha
T02D3150:174a-46: ho:/ bha ga b'an sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra
T02D3150:174a-47: m'a me munytsa badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa ma
T02D3150:174b-0: ya sa tva a'a: de skad brjod @174b la ji
T02D3150:174b-1: ltar bde bar rgyu bar bya ba'o //
T02D3150:174b-2: 'phags pa yi ge drug pa rig pa chen mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
